task.summary: new package to evaluate fI_curves more rigorously
new script: compute DAP characteristics at different holding potentials
restructured HodgkinHuxleyFitter and changed new_optimization to optimization
make optimization algorithms work for server based optimization; plots sensitivity analysis
added code to decompose exp. cells sinus stimulus in ramp and theta
added function to evaluate model on all protocols
added function to evaluate model on all protocols
some updates in STA and noise modeling
plots for thesis started dap_mechanism plot
comp_stellate_pyramidal and double_ramp plot for thesis

expression.expression-string: np.array(get_spike_characteristics(v, t, characteristics, v_rest, check=True, **get_spike_characteristics_dict()), dtype=float)
np.array(get_spike_characteristics(v, t, characteristics, v_rest, check=True, **get_spike_characteristics_dict(), dtype=float)

fig = pl.figure() ax = fig.add_subplot(111, projection='3d') ax.plot(ISI_1st[cell_ids_IV_idxs].flatten(), characteristics_mat[cell_ids_characteristics_idxs, characteristics == 'height_3ms_after_AP'].flatten().astype(float), lag_1st_AP[cell_ids_IV_idxs].flatten(), 'ok', alpha=0.5, markersize=4.0) ax.set_xlabel('1st ISI (ms)') ax.set_ylabel('DAP height (mV)') ax.set_zlabel('Lag 1st AP (ms)')
pl.show()

fig = pl.figure() ax = fig.add_subplot(111, projection='3d') ax.plot(ISI_1st[cell_ids_IV_idxs].flatten(), characteristics_mat[cell_ids_characteristics_idxs, characteristics == 'height_3ms_after_AP'].flatten().astype(float), lag_1st_AP[cell_ids_IV_idxs].flatten(), 'ok', alpha=0.5, markersize=4.0) ax.set_xlabel('1st ISI (ms)') ax.set_ylabel('DAP amp (mV)') ax.set_zlabel('Lag 1st AP (ms)')
pl.show()
pl.figure() pl.plot(np.arange(len(v_mat[i, j, :]))*0.01, v_mat[i, j, :]) pl.show()

crosspoint = np.argmin(np.abs(curve_act - curve_inact)) ax0.fill_between(v_range[:crosspoint+1], 0, curve_inact[:crosspoint+1], color='0.5') ax0.fill_between(v_range[crosspoint:], 0, curve_act[crosspoint:], color='0.5') ax0.plot(v_range, curve_act, color='k', label='Act.') ax0.plot(v_range, curve_inact, color='k', label='Inact.') ax0.legend() pl.show()

crosspoint = np.argmin(np.abs(curve_act - curve_inact)) ax0.fill_between(v_range[:crosspoint], 0, curve_inact[:crosspoint], color='0.5') ax0.fill_between(v_range[crosspoint:], 0, curve_act[crosspoint:], color='0.5') ax0.plot(v_range, curve_act, color='k', label='Act.') ax0.plot(v_range, curve_inact, color='k', label='Inact.') ax0.legend() pl.show()

crosspoint = np.argmin(np.abs(curve_act - curve_inact)) ax0.fill_between(v_range[:crosspoint], 0, curve_inact, color='0.5') ax0.fill_between(v_range[crosspoint:], 0, curve_act, color='0.5') ax0.plot(v_range, curve_act, color='k', label='Act.') ax0.plot(v_range, curve_inact, color='k', label='Inact.') ax0.legend() pl.show()
